ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will confront each other, questioning one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then one turned to the other in an enquiry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then some of them will turn to others, and will ask each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will turn to each other and ask questions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So one among them turns to the other, questioning. –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then they will turn to one another, mutually questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then shall some of them advance to others, questioning each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They advance one upon another, asking each other questions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And some of them draw near unto others, mutually questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will turn to one another with questions:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they will advance Unto each other, mutually questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Some of them will turn to others, questioning each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then they will turn to one another and question one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then they will turn to one another, mutually questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will go to one another asking each other questions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then they will approach one another, questioning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:50] Some of them, some of the inhabitants of Paradise, will turn to others, questioning each other, regarding what they experienced in the [life of the] world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And some of them draw near unto others, mutually questioning) conversing with one another.
